topic.title: SYSTEMIC ANTI-CANCER THERAPY DRUG REGIMEN MODIFICATION INDICATOR FOR DOSE REDUCTION
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Regimen was modified by reducing the dose of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy drug administered, at any point after commencement of the Systemic Anti-Cancer Therapy Drug Regimen.
